org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impurity

Class ImpurityCalculator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.mllib.tree.impurity.ImpurityCalculator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntropyCalculator, GiniCalculator, VarianceCalculator

    public abstract class ImpurityCalculator
extends Object
    Stores statistics for one (node, feature, bin) for calculating impurity. Unlike ImpurityAggregator, this class stores its own data and is for a specific (node, feature, bin).

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImpurityCalculator add(ImpurityCalculator other)
      Add the stats from another calculator into this one, modifying and returning this calculator.
      abstract double calculate()
      Calculate the impurity from the stored sufficient statistics.
      abstract ImpurityCalculator copy()
      Make a deep copy of this ImpurityCalculator.
      abstract long count()
      Number of data points accounted for in the sufficient statistics.
      abstract double predict()
      Prediction which should be made based on the sufficient statistics.
      double prob(double label)
      Probability of the label given by predict, or -1 if no probability is available.
      double[] stats() 
      ImpurityCalculator subtract(ImpurityCalculator other)
      Subtract the stats from another calculator from this one, modifying and returning this calculator.
